title: Gold  Looking for an ADC Main to duo with or a team :)

embed.description: Skyla / Gold 5 73LP / 259W 260L Win Ratio 50% / Ahri - 46W 25L Win Ratio 65%, Lux - 34W 25L Win Ratio 58%, Thresh - 17W 25L Win Ratio 40%, Janna - 22W 17L Win Ratio 56%, Syndra - 16W 17L Win Ratio 48%

body:
Hey im a support/mid main and I would love to find an adc main idealy to duo with :) Pretty flexible as to picks I can play!
I also am Gold V and am currently maining mid however only because I decided if I wanted to climb I would have to play in a carry role myself!!! But I would ideally prefer to go back to being a support main, but am open to jungle mains too as then we could have either support/jg synergy or mid/jg synergy!
Thanks and add me in game :D
IGN: Skyla
I also have discord/skype/curse but my main voice coms app is discord :D
Feel free to add me on discord for a bit of a message and/or chat before we head out on the rift :D

replies.body: I'm Gold 4 I main ADC and Mid can also jungle fairly well add me ingame if your interestested - ii deceived ii
hello i add you as a friend .plz check it .thank you
hello i am ad /sup main .ign :solo manmohanned . i come form CN.my champion pool :cait ,twich ,kog,jinx,ashe and varus.
